info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 4:14PM EDT until July 12 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Berkshire County in western Massachusetts... Northeastern Columbia County in east central New York... Southeastern Rensselaer County in east central New York... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 413 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nassau, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Pittsfield, Nassau, Lenox, Stephentown, New Lebanon, Hancock, Lanesborough, Canaan, East Nassau, Totem Lodge, East Schodack, Barkerville, Garfield, West Stephentown, Jacks Corners, Hoag Corners, Millers Corners, Rayville, Malden Bridge and Riders Mills. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
